name: Suite
headline: More than a Room
details: Comfort meets simplicity. Our Standard Room offers everything you need for a peaceful stay — clean, cozy, and budget-friendly without compromising quality.

name: Executive Suite
headline: Luxury, Privacy, and Peace of Mind - All in One
details: A step up in space and style. The Deluxe Room gives you extra comfort, elegant furnishing, and a relaxed ambiance for both work and rest.

name: Standard
headline: Everything You Need for a Peaceful Night’s Rest
details: Designed for travelers who love a little more room. The Luxury Double features spacious bedding, refined decor, and the perfect atmosphere for couples or solo guests wanting extra comfort.

name: Luxury Double
headline: Spacious Comfort for Two, or Just for You
details: Experience more than a room — enjoy a private suite that offers a living area, elegant furnishings, and an elevated sense of space and privacy for extended stays or special visits.

name: Deluxe
headline: Designed for Comfort, Styled for Ease
details: Our finest offering. The Executive Suite is tailored for distinguished guests who desire luxury, tranquility, and class — complete with a separate lounge, refined décor, and top-tier amenities.
